channel.title: 2,000,000 Daily Ranking
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "2,000,000 Daily Ranking" - any tips on getting this with some working out?

item.title: Re: 2,000,000 Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: Sweet. He added the XP guide so now all you that would like to use it, it is under the guide section called Ranking Guide. Hope it helps!

item.title: Re: 2,000,000 Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: There. I sent him a message and hopefully he does something about it.

item.title: Re: 2,000,000 Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: I dont know. Im going to try and see if Uzuki will add another tab under guides and see if he would do that. Good idea!

item.title: Re: 2,000,000 Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: why isnt the XP guide included under guides?

item.title: Re: 2,000,000 Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
http://bvs.wikidot.com/guide:xp

By the way, the people who are hitting 7,000,000 XP are usually already Sannin. Of course, Razithel hit around 14,000,000 XP as a Jonin by stacking every possible bonus and smokebombing out of low AP/XP missions.

So 2,000,000 XP is easily doable. You just have to have the stamina and AP/XP bonuses.

item.title: 2,000,000 Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
Ive already deduced that its possible in some circumstances to come away with upto 1000 stamina, but how to use this much or less if you cant get that much stamina to hit 2,000,000 Daily Ranking.
What sort of missions/items etc and in what sort of capacity would be best advised to reach this much DR? (since there seems to be no formal, put together list). As ive seen some crazy people with over 7,000,000 (how??????) Daily Ranking.

I understand if listing how to go about it may be considered a spoiler and if it is, sorry for asking and delete the thread if neccessary!

Thanks in advance! :o)
